content.rendered:
Silk Way West Airlines operates cargo flights to 19 destinations in Europe, Asia and North America and eleven new routes as of 2017 alone, including to Japan, Malaysia, Kuwait, Singapore, Bangladesh, Saudi Arabia as well as the Hong King-Chicago route over the Pacific Ocean. In October 2018, the company announced it would launch a twice-weekly freighter service from its global hub in Baku, Azerbijan to Tianjin, China.

 

 Queries handled Silk Way West Airlines Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

List of Silk Way West Airlines Offices

Chicago – Patton Dr, Chicago
New York – Jamaica
London – Hounslow Middlesex 
Netherlands – Amsterdam
Luxembourg – Luxair Cargo Center, Luxembourg
Germany – Frankfurt
Italy – Milan
Russia – Moscow
UKraine – Kiev
Turkey – Istanbul
Georgia – Tbilisi
Kazakhstan – Aktau
Dubai – Dubai Free Zone
Afghanistan – Kabul
Japan – Tokyo
Seoul – Seoul
China – Zhengzhou
China – Shanghai
China – Hong Kong
Singapore – Changi Airport
Malaysia – Kuala Lumpur

  Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the  Silk Way West Airlines Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the  Silk Way West Airlines: (click on the stars below)
